ygData.messageBody:
was it a big fat long staff that was kind of twisted?

----- Original Message -----

Subject: Re: [EverQuest] rts and skull of jhen tra

other
> ones, druid who was able to teleport the group around (they were at a
> druid's ring), etc.

around

> Thormael
